Build Identifier: Win7 Professional (x64) (build 7600), Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101207 Thunderbird/3.1.7

I would like to be able to get new messages by right-clicking on the Thunderbird taskbar icon (when Thunderbird is already running minimized) and selecting an option to get new messages so I can simply and easily check for new messages without opening the Thunderbird window, clicking on "Get New Messages" and then minimizing the window again.  

Reproducible: Always
